How does the consensus approach involvin: It predicts the most promising mutations for experimental testing by combining results from all three protocols.
It directly measures the binding affinity improvements in vitro.
It synthesizes the mutations for structural analysis.
It validates the experimental results of the binding affinity tests.
What challenge related to false-positive: Accurately predicting the balance between new non-polar contacts and steric strain.
Synthesizing mutations that do not destabilize the VHH structure.
Measuring the binding affinity improvements in vivo.
Validating the experimental results of the binding affinity tests.
What impact does the use of Rosetta have: It contributes to identifying mutations that significantly improve binding affinity and enhance virus neutralization.
It directly measures the binding affinity improvements in vitro.
It synthesizes the mutations for structural analysis.
It validates the experimental results of the binding affinity tests.
What is the primary role of Rosetta in t: Evaluating the energies of single-point mutations alongside SIE-SCWRL and FoldX.
Performing experimental validation of predicted mutations.
Synthesizing the VHH-72 mutants for testing.
Directly measuring the binding affinity of VHH-72 to the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein.
What specific function does Rosetta-Inte: Scoring the binding affinity of VHH-72 mutants based on average Z-score and rank score.
Synthesizing the VHH-72 mutants for experimental testing.
Measuring the neutralization capabilities of the mutants in vitro.
Performing experimental validation of the predicted mutations.
